explains: n. 露天市场，广场；走廊

sentences.en: "It takes a team a while to jell," Mike Piazza said.
sentences.cn: “要让一个团队合作融洽需要一点时间，”迈克·皮阿扎说。

sentences.en: California is just south of the Piazza.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚位于大广场的南边。

sentences.en: “Even to speak of ‘the city’ is misleading, ” said Piazza, in an interview with Psychiatric News.
sentences.cn: “实际上说到‘这个城市’是种误导”Pizza在与《精神病学新闻》的会谈中表示。
